Best product ,Fast cooling Fraser ,No noice. I like this product__________

Good Product I don't know why, but this product has low ratings. I ordered it because this product was of 2020 release. On the other hand, all other products were 2016, 2017 releases.Coming to the product::It does what it is supposed to do. At a budget of 20K, no other product comes even close to the features provided by this refrigerator. I see people complaining about, display not provided on the door. But that is a bit of misinformation from Samsung and not the seller. If you can ignore it, then just go for this refrigerator.
Very nice üëåüëç Very nice

Cooling efficiency not good product Cooling is not consistent. Despite being a digital inverter model, voltage fluctuations are causing cooling to be very low even in highest setting. i have complained to samsung and they said nothing can be done. Asked me to buy a booster stabilizer for rs 5800. Then whats the use of Digital Inverter inside.
